![Arcana Novum](ArcanaNovum_Banner.png)

# A fabric server-sided magic mod that adds new items and multiblocks to Minecraft.


[![Arcana Novum](https://img.shields.io/badge/dynamic/json?labelColor=black&color=grey&label=&query=title&url=https://api.modrinth.com/v2/project/9J7sCd3t&style=flat&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://modrinth.com/mod/arcana-novum)
[![Downloads](https://img.shields.io/badge/dynamic/json?labelColor=black&color=grey&label=&suffix=%20downloads&query=downloads&url=https://api.modrinth.com/v2/project/9J7sCd3t&style=flat&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://modrinth.com/mod/arcana-novum)
[![Followers](https://img.shields.io/badge/dynamic/json?labelColor=black&color=grey&label=&suffix=%20followers&query=followers&url=https://api.modrinth.com/v2/project/9J7sCd3t&style=flat&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://modrinth.com/mod/arcana-novum)
[![Versions](https://img.shields.io/badge/dynamic/json?label=Available%20for&color=4bab62&query=version&url=https://api.blueish.dev/api/minecraft/version?id=9J7sCd3t)](https://modrinth.com/mod/arcana-novum)

#### ![Server, Optional Client](https://img.shields.io/badge/environment-server%2c%20opt%20client-c65135?style=flat-square) This mod only needs to be installed on a server.

<a href="https://modrinth.com/mod/fabric-api">
<img src="https://i.imgur.com/Ol1Tcf8.png" alt="Requires Fabric API" width="200">
</a>
